Class Round<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard>

Represents the base class of a game round.

Namespace: CardGames.Core
Assembly: CardGames.Core.dll
Syntax
public abstract class Round<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard> : IRound<TPlayer, TDeck, TCard> where TPlayer : class, IPlayer<TDeck, TCard> where TDeck : class, IDeck<TCard> where TCard : class, ICard
Type Parameters
Name Description
TPlayer

The type that represents the customized Player<TDeck, TCard> for a given game.
TDeck

The type that represents the customized Deck<TCard> for a given game.
TCard

The type that represents the customized Card for a given game.
